snippet: The Secret Service did not say whether the letter, screened at an off-site mailing center, had been addressed to President Obama or to someone else.
abstract: Letter bound for White House tests positive for cyanide at off-site mail screening facility; authorities do not indicate whether letter was addressed to Pres Obama or someone else at White House.
lead_paragraph: The Secret Service did not say whether the letter, screened at an off-site mailing center, had been addressed to President Obama or to someone else.

headline.main: Letter Bound for White House Tests Positive for Cyanide
headline.print_headline: Letter to White House Tests Positive for Cyanide
